code: class  Solution  {   public :     int  findWinningPlayer ( vector < int >&  skills ,  int  k )  {   int  ans  =  0 ;   int  wins  =  0 ;   for  ( int  i  =  1 ;  i  <  skills . size ()  &&  wins  <  k ;  ++ i )   if  ( skills [ i ]  >  skills [ ans ])  {   ans  =  i ;   wins  =  1 ;   }  else  {   ++ wins ;   }   return  ans ;   }  };
